mapper.select: SELECT si.created, (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2),0))- (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2),0)) AS dayCommission, COUNT(si.order_id) AS dayOrderNum FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND YEAR(si.created)=#{year} AND MONTH(si.created)=#{month} GROUP BY DAY(si.created)

SELECT (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2),0))- (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2),0)+IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2),0))AS saleAllMoney, (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_gongju),2),0)-IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_gongju),2),0)) AS gongjuAllMoney, (IF(ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.order_money_haocai),2),0)-IF(ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(si.refund_money_haocai),2),0)) AS haocaiAllMoney, COUNT(si.order_id) AS orderNum FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND YEAR(si.created)=#{year} AND MONTH(si.created)=#{month};

SELECT IF(ROUND(SUM(balance_in),2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(SUM(balance_in),2),0) AS allCommission FROM balance WHERE haocai_money IS NOT NULL AND sale_id=#{saleId} OR gongju_money IS NOT NULL AND sale_id=#{saleId};

SELECT si.sale_id, o.order_id, DATE_FORMAT(o.created, '%Y-%c-%e %T') AS orderCreated, u.true_name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0) AS allMoney, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0) AS refundMoney, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)+IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0)) AS actualMoney, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0)-IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0)) AS haocaiMoney, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0)-IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)) AS gongjuMoney FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND YEAR(si.created) =#{year} AND MONTH(si.created)=#{month} GROUP BY si.order_id ORDER BY o.created DESC LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) from ( SELECT count(0) FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND YEAR(si.created) =#{year} AND MONTH(si.created)=#{month} GROUP BY si.order_id ORDER BY o.created DESC ) AS a

SELECT u.true_name AS userName, u.phone AS userPhone, DATE_FORMAT(o.created, '%Y-%c-%e %T') AS orderCreated, o.state AS orderState, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0) AS orderMoneyHaocai, IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0) AS orderMoneyGongju, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0) AS refundMoneyHaocai, IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0) AS refundMoneyGongju, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_haocai,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_haocai,2),0)) AS actualMoneyHaocai, (IF(ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.order_money_gongju,2),0))- (IF(ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2) IS NOT NULL,ROUND(si.refund_money_gongju,2),0)) AS actualMoneyGongju FROM sale_income si LEFT JOIN ordera o ON o.order_id=si.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.user_id=o.user_id WHERE si.sale_id=#{saleId} AND si.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY si.order_id

SELECT oi.item_name, oi.item_property_namea, oi.item_property_nameb, oi.item_property_namec, oi.price, oi.num, (oi.price*oi.num) AS total FROM ordera o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.user_id=u.user_id WHERE o.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY oi.item_name LIMIT ${page.currentNumber},${page.numberPerPage}

SELECT count(0) FROM ( SELECT count(0) FROM ordera o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id=oi.order_id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON o.user_id=u.user_id WHERE o.order_id=#{orderId} GROUP BY oi.item_name ) AS a
